name: Lifeless Space
description:
L I F E L E S S    S P A C E

Control an unprescribed form by releasing its own elements. Embark on a journey full of sacrifices and choices that costs life. Find a soul in a lifeless space... but... is it really lifeless?

Controls:

arrows or WSADmoveRrestartVRED (fing)BBLUE (freezing)NGREEN (growing)MYELLOW (moving)


Pro tips: 

Change to YELLOW to turn other bodies into pushable, movable objects. Bump into them to move them. Touch them while being BLUE to freeze them.

Change to GREEN and touch other objects- they will grow. Then you can drain their bigger bodies and gain much more.

Ludum Dare 44 Jam submission
Theme: Your life is currency

Made in Defold by Paweł Jarosz
